flawed_nl_solution:
For each class, he has to review the questions of 35 students, in total, he will review 10 * 35 = <<10*35=305>>305 questions.
For the 5 classes, he will review a total of 305 * 5 = <<305*5=1525>>1525 questions.
#### 1525

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 350, not 305. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
